LEONINA71.name: Via Leonina 71
LEONINA71.self_checkin_instructions: BUILDING: enter with code 7171 + key symbol (or use the round key). APARTMENT: use the long square-ended key; pull the heavy door gently TOWARDS you, then turn counter-clockwise until it opens. If stuck, lift the handle slightly and try again.
LEONINA71.checkout_instructions: By 11:00 please: 1) leave keys on the table; 2) switch OFF AC, lights and hot plate; 3) close windows/doors; 4) take out general waste if full. Thank you!
LEONINA71.wifi_ssid: See the router label on the table
LEONINA71.wifi_password: See the router label on the table
LEONINA71.wifi_note: If Wi-Fi is slow or drops: 1) toggle Wi-Fi on your phone; 2) power-cycle the router (OFF 10s → ON) and wait 2–3 minutes; 3) try standing closer to the router.
LEONINA71.water_note: Cold water is drinkable. Hot water should always be available.
LEONINA71.boiler_warning: IMPORTANT: do NOT touch the switch on the left of the bathroom mirror — it controls hot water.
LEONINA71.boiler_reset_steps: If water isn’t hot: let it run 30–60s → check the boiler light is ON → wait 2–3 min and retry. Still no hot water? Call the host.
LEONINA71.bathroom_amenities: Hairdryer, bath mat, toilet paper, hand soap (starter set).
LEONINA71.towels_note: Beds are made. Each guest has 1 large, 1 medium and 1 small towel.
LEONINA71.lighting_kitchen: Switch on the right side of the stairs (facing the kitchen).
LEONINA71.lighting_terrace: Switch inside the apartment, on the right before exiting to the terrace.
LEONINA71.appliance_notes: AC: set 23–24°C and turn OFF when leaving. HOT PLATE: never leave pots unattended; switch OFF after use. TV: standard TV with 2 remotes; if ‘No Signal’, ensure HDMI/source is correct and TV is ON.
LEONINA71.plants_note: If you like, feel free to water the plants once a day (except cacti).
LEONINA71.trash_rules: Use the courtyard bins. Separate glass, plastic/metal and paper per posted signs; general waste daily. Do not leave trash on the terrace (wind/animals).
LEONINA71.eat_recommendations: Nearby picks: • La Taverna dei Fori Imperiali (Via della Madonna dei Monti 9, +39 06 679 8643) — classic Roman trattoria • Ai Tre Scalini (Via Panisperna 251, +39 06 4890 7495) — historic wine bar with small plates • Blackmarket Hall (Via Panisperna 101) — cocktails • La Barrique (Via del Boschetto 41) — cozy wine bar
LEONINA71.drink_recommendations: Aperitivo: Piazza Madonna dei Monti. Cocktails: Blackmarket Hall (Via Panisperna 101). Wine: La Barrique (Via del Boschetto 41).
LEONINA71.shopping_tips: Mercato Monti (weekend designers & vintage, Via Leonina 46). Via del Boschetto & Via Urbana: artisan leather, jewelry, ceramics.
LEONINA71.visit_highlights: Walkable: Colosseum (≈10 min), Roman Forum (≈12 min), San Pietro in Vincoli (Michelangelo’s Moses). Hidden gems: Santa Prassede mosaics; Scalinata dei Borgia; underground of San Martino ai Monti (guided).
LEONINA71.transport_metro: Metro Line B — Cavour station (≈5 min walk). For Termini/Line A, go one stop to Termini.
LEONINA71.transport_bus: Buses on Via Cavour connect across the center (e.g., 75/117/84). Buy tickets at tobacco shops (‘Tabacchi’) or via ATAC app; validate on board.
LEONINA71.airport_transfer: FCO: Leonardo Express to Termini (32 min) → Metro B to Cavour (1 stop) or 12–15 min walk. CIA: shuttle bus to Termini → Metro B to Cavour. Taxis have fixed airport fares—use official white taxis.
LEONINA71.useful_numbers: Emergency 112 • Police 113 • Ambulance 118 • Fire 115 • Taxi 06 3570 • City info 06 0606
